title: ABSOLUTELY GORGEOUS NEW CUSTOM HOME IN THE COUNTRY
map_address: 486 Malorie Way SPACE B near MANSFIELD
posting_body: Beautiful 3 bed 2 ba Executive home out in the country.
Gorgeous views.
Quiet away from town.
Small dog or cat okay.
Water included.
Uses propane.
Solar PGE very affordable for new tenant.
Fridge and built in microwave included.
High end dishwasher.
Pictures to come.
Please make an appt via email.
Please do not bother current tenants.
Looking for a financially stable family who loves the outdoors and can appreciate the private quiet country home with huge backyard to enjoy.
Perfect for BBQ with the family.
Enjoy morning sunrise with incredible view of the mountains.
Watch the sunset and observe beautiful wildlife.
Must see.
Will rent quickly.
Every person must fill out an application before showing.
We must be able to approve your application to ensure you qualify before showing.
Application fee $25.00
This is a new custom home.
Only one tenant has lived in this unit.
Custom appliances.
State of the art Central Heating and Air Condition.
One of a kind property.
